INLINELINKTEXT.SettingsJournalEntryHint: The field within a JournalEntry from which the text will be taken (leave blank to restore default value)
INLINELINKTEXT.SettingsJournalEntryPageH: The field within a JournalEntryPage from which the text will be taken (leave blank to restore default value)
INLINELINKTEXT.SettingsActorHint: The field within a Actor from which the text will be taken (leave blank to restore default value)
INLINELINKTEXT.SettingsRollTableHint: The field within a RollTable from which the text will be taken (leave blank to restore default value)
INLINELINKTEXT.SettingsSceneHint: The field within a Scene from which the text will be taken (leave blank to restore default value)
INLINELINKTEXT.SettingsItemHint: The field within a Item from which the text will be taken (leave blank to restore default value)
INLINELINKTEXT.CompendiumPlaceholderHint: The HTML to be inserted when the linked compendium data is not immediately available
INLINELINKTEXT.DisplayHint: Whether to display all the text from the linked entity, only the first paragraph (ignoring headers), or only the first sentence of the first paragraph
